input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Green BH Balsam Fir Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Red/Green Outdoor Berry Pine Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Red/Green Outdoor Winter Evergreen Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Green Vermont White Spruce Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Red/Green Outdoor Lit Nordic Splendor Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Queens of Christmas 9 ft. Pre-Lit LED Sequoia Decorated with the Tropical Ornament Collection'
  - Name='Sullivans Home Decor Cluster Lighted Garland'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. 72" Artificial Mixed Berry Pine Cone & Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Norfolk 9-Foot Real Touch Snow Pine Garland with Lights'
  - Name='Northlight 100' x 12inch Green Commercial Length Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='HGTV Home Collection 6 ft. Pre-Lit Christmas by the Sea Coral Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 6 ft. Unlit Artificial Pine and Grapevine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 50 ft Long Pre-Lit Christmas Garland Pathway Lights'
  - Name='Plow & Hearth 1.33 ft. Garland with 48 Cool/Brown Lights'
  - Name='vidaXL Christmas Garland with LED Lights 33 ft Black'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 72'' in. Lighted Faux Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6 ft. Decorative Collection Long Needle Pine Cone Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Antique Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Costway 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Halloween Garland with 50 Purple LED Lights'
  - Name='Melrose International 6ft Pine Garland'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm Newberry Pine Artificial Trees'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Green BH Balsam Fir Garland Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas garland with fir base, similar silhouette and purpose, but likely different fir type and no mention of pre-lit or length; from a different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Red/Green Outdoor Berry Pine Garland Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland suitable for outdoor use, but additional features (berries) and multi-item set reduce direct similarity; no mention of lights or exact fir base.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Red/Green Outdoor Winter Evergreen Garland Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Evergreen garland, likely similar silhouette and usage but includes winter-themed decoration and multi-item; no explicit light feature mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Green Vermont White Spruce Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial spruce garland, similar to pine/fir in function, but different branch type; no explicit pre-lit feature or length given.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Red/Green Outdoor Lit Nordic Splendor Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit outdoor garland, likely similar construction and function with LED lights, but different styling and fir type implied by Nordic Splendor name.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Queens of Christmas 9 ft. Pre-Lit LED Sequoia Decorated with the Tropical Ornament Collection
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit 9 ft garland but made with Sequoia, which differs in construction and style; tropical ornaments contrast with pine cones and traditional look.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sullivans Home Decor Cluster Lighted Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General lighted garland but no indication of pine or fir construction or length; likely different style and usage focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. 72" Artificial Mixed Berry Pine Cone & Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pine and pine cone garland, 6 feet (72"), not pre-lit mentioned but close in style and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Norfolk 9-Foot Real Touch Snow Pine Garland with Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 9 ft pre-lit pine garland with realistic touch, lights included, very closely matches length, lighting, and style of reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 100' x 12inch Green Commercial Length Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland but extremely long commercial length (100 ft) making it a different product use case despite material similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: HGTV Home Collection 6 ft. Pre-Lit Christmas by the Sea Coral Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland but made with coral theme, diverging significantly in material and construction from pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6 ft. Unlit Artificial Pine and Grapevine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland of 6 ft length without lights; similar but lacks lighting feature and is shorter length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 50 ft Long Pre-Lit Christmas Garland Pathway Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit, very long garland designed for pathways, likely different scale and construction despite lighting similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Plow & Hearth 1.33 ft. Garland with 48 Cool/Brown Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very short garland length (1.33 ft) with different light color and less typical use case, unlike the 9 ft indoor/outdoor pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: vidaXL Christmas Garland with LED Lights 33 ft Black
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unusually colored (black) garland with LED lights and much longer length, likely different material and aesthetic purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 72'' in. Lighted Faux Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 72 inch lighted faux garland similar length, pre-lit status aligns but no specific pine or fir or decorative elements stated.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6 ft. Decorative Collection Long Needle Pine Cone Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, pine cone garland with clear lights, though shorter length (6 ft vs. 9 ft), similar construction and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Antique Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir garland similar to the reference but no pre-lit or length details; likely similar silhouette and winter theme.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Halloween Garland with 50 Purple LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit, but purple lights and Halloween theme distinguish it from the warm white pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Melrose International 6ft Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6 ft pine garland similar in style but shorter length and no mention of lights or decorations.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm Newberry Pine Artificial Trees
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine trees, which is a different product category than garland, although related in holiday decor.
